game.name: Race! Then Retry...
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A fast paced, difficult, arcade racing experience. Race through over 30 unique tracks as you try to survive and beat the clock.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast paced, difficult, arcade racing experience. Race through over 30 unique tracks as you try to survive and beat the clock.
